CustomField.formula: IF ( ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "NX I-deas"), "NX_I_deas", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "NX"), "NX", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "Teamcenter"), "Teamcenter", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "Solid Edge"), "Solid_Edge", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "Technomatix"), "Technomatix", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "3DSync"), "X3DSync", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "Femap"), "Femap", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Category__c , "Siemens") && ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "" ), "Siemens_PLM", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Category__c , "Construction") && ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "" ), "Construction", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "Inventor"), "Inventor", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "AutoCAD"), "AutoCAD", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "Vault"), "Vault", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "Simulation"), "Simulation", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "VRED"), "VRED", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "Showcase"), "Showcase", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "Alias"), "Alias", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Category__c , "Autodesk") && ISPICKVAL( Subcategory__c, "" ), "Autodesk", "None")))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Subcategory_Name
